hippodrome

Class GeneralInformationRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • hippodrome.GeneralInformationRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface, java.rmi.Remote

    public class GeneralInformationRepository
extends java.lang.Object
implements GeneralInformationRepositoryInterface
    Class which represents an archive of all hippodrome's actions and memorabilia. This item allows the entities playing at an hippodrome to collect information about the various statuses and snapshots all the instants while something is happening.
    Since:
    0.1

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      GeneralInformationRepository(int numberOfHorses, int numberOfSpectators, boolean onlyLogonFile)
      Creates a General Repository of Information which saves a snapshot of all instants of time throughout a horse run game.

    • Constructor Detail

      • GeneralInformationRepository

        public GeneralInformationRepository(int numberOfHorses,
                                    int numberOfSpectators,
                                    boolean onlyLogonFile)
        Creates a General Repository of Information which saves a snapshot of all instants of time throughout a horse run game.
        Parameters:
        numberOfHorses - number of pairs Horse/Jockey to run on track.
        numberOfSpectators - number of Spectators to attend on track.
        onlyLogonFile - flag for deactivate the debug on stdout.
